tool_description: Detailed, qualitative information on over 200 different breeds of dogs. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/dogs.
name: Dogs by API-Ninjas
title: Dogs by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: /v1/dogs
api_list.description: Get a list of dog breeds matching specified parameters. Returns at most 20 results. To access more than 20 results, use the offset parameter to offset results in multiple API calls.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: number of results to offset for pagination.

optional_parameters.name: energy
optional_parameters.description: How much energy the breed has. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates low energy and 5 indicates high energy.

optional_parameters.name: protectiveness
optional_parameters.description: How likely the breed is to alert strangers. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates minimal alerting and 5 indicates maximum alerting.

optional_parameters.name: trainability
optional_parameters.description: How easy it is to train the breed. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates the breed is very difficult to train and 5 indicates the breed is very easy to train.

optional_parameters.name: shedding
optional_parameters.description: How much hair the breed sheds. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates no shedding and 5 indicates maximum shedding.

optional_parameters.name: barking
optional_parameters.description: How vocal the breed is. Possible values: 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, where 0 indicates minimal barking and 5 indicates maximum barking.
